title: Norma's "proper" jerk pork
ingredients: ['2kg bone-in pork belly', '1 lime', '3 dessertspoons garlic powder', '2 dessertspoons ground pimento', 'a few sprigs of fresh thyme', '2 teaspoons ground nutmeg', '3 teaspoons salt', '2 teaspoons whole pimento, crushed', '2 to 3 dessertspoons jerk seasoning', '1 Scotch bonnet chilli, finely chopped (optional)']
